name: Yaamon
inheritedEffect:
[When Attacking][Once Per Turn] If this Digimon has
                            [Wizard] or [Demon Lord] in its traits, trash the
                            top 2 cards of your deck.

name: Impmon
effect:
[When Attacking] If you have 20 or more cards in
                            your trash, this Digimon may digivolve into
                            [Beelzemon] from your trash for a digivolution cost
                            of 3, ignoring its digivolution requirements.
inheritedEffect:
[Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When a card is trashed
                            from your deck, delete 1 of your opponent's level 3
                            Digimon.

name: Candlemon
effect:
[On Play] Trash the top 2 cards of your deck.[On
                            Deletion] If you have 10 or more cards in your
                            trash, ＜Draw 1＞. (Draw 1 card from your deck.)

name: Phascomon
effect:
＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you
                            may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to
                            attack it instead.)[Your Turn] This Digimon can't
                            attack players.

name: Porcupamon
effect:
＜Blocker＞ (When an opponent's Digimon attacks, you
                            may suspend this Digimon to force the opponent to
                            attack it instead.) [On Play] Trash the top 2 cards
                            of your deck.

name: Witchmon
effect:
[When Digivolving] Trash the top 3 cards of your
                            deck.
inheritedEffect:
[Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Wizard] or
                            [Demon Lord] in its traits, it gets +2000 DP.

name: Baalmon
effect:
[When Digivolving] Trash the top 3 cards of your
                            deck.[When Digivolving] This Digimon gains "[On
                            Deletion] If there are 10 or more cards in your
                            trash, you may play 1 [Beelzemon] from your trash
                            without paying the cost" until the end of your
                            opponent's turn.
inheritedEffect:
[Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Wizard] or
                            [Demon Lord] in its traits, it gets +2000 DP.

name: Beelzemon
effect:
[When Digivolving] Trash the top 4 cards of your
                            deck. [All Turns][Once Per Turn] When a card is
                            trashed from your deck, gain 1 memory for every 10
                            cards in your trash.[Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When
                            a card is trashed from your deck, this Digimon gains
                            ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1
                            additional security card) for the turn.

name: Beelzemon
effect:
[When Digivolving] Trash the top 4 cards of your
                            deck. [All Turns][Once Per Turn] When a card is
                            trashed from your deck, gain 1 memory for every 10
                            cards in your trash.[Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When
                            a card is trashed from your deck, this Digimon gains
                            ＜Security Attack +1＞ (This Digimon checks 1
                            additional security card) for the turn.

name: BeelStarmon
effect:
When you would play this card from your hand, reduce
                            the play cost by 4 for every 10 cards in your
                            trash.[All Turns][Once Per Turn] When a card is
                            trashed from your deck, you may play 1 [Impmon] from
                            your trash without paying the cost. The Digimon
                            played by this effect gains ＜Rush＞ for the
                            turn.[Opponent's Turn] When an opponent's Digimon
                            attacks, trash the top card of your deck.

name: Beelzemon Blast Mode
effect:
When this card is trashed from your deck, delete 1
                            of your opponent's level 3 or lower Digimon. For
                            every 10 cards in your trash, add 1 to the maximum
                            level of the Digimon you can choose with this
                            effect. [When Digivolving] Unsuspend this Digimon.
                            If you have 20 or more cards in your trash, gain 3
                            memory.

name: Ai & Mako
effect:
[On Play] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 Digimon card with [Evil], [Wizard], or [Demon Lord] in its traits among them to your hand. Place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
[Your Turn] When one of your Digimon digivolves into a purple Digimon, you may suspend this Tamer and return 1 card from your hand to your deck to gain 1 memory.
securityEffect: [Security] Play this card without paying the cost.

name: Rivals' Barrage
effect:
When this card is trashed from your deck, you may
                            place it in the battle area. [Main] Delete 1 of your
                            opponent's Digimon with the highest level. [Main]
                            ＜Delay＞ (After this card is placed, by trashing it
                            the next turn or later, activate the effect below.)
                            ・Return 1 purple Digimon card or Tamer card from
                            your trash to your hand.
securityEffect:
[Security] Delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with
                            the highest level.
